name: Farm Frenzy
description: Slip into a pair of overalls and try your hand at running a farm! From tending to the fields where your cows graze to gathering eggs for sale at the town market, Farm Frenzy is as stimulating as the real thing-- only you won't have to experience the nasty smells!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1000 MHz CPUMemory: 256 MB RamDirectX®: 8Hard Drive: 24 MB of free space
